duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement, manage, support, and maintain Verily’s HR systems and processes including the Workday HCM suite.
Lead security governance and management across the Workday system and manage enhancements and changes.
Educate HR teams on enhancements, lead deployment activities, and provide ongoing support for the Workday Core HCM & Advanced Compensation module.
Collaborate with HR and business leaders to design and implement compensation processes aligned with organizational goals.
Create system configuration documents, functional specification documents, test plans and cases, and ultimately lead testing strategy for the system and user acceptance testing.
Lead data conversions and testing activities during implementation and M&A projects in the future.

education_certification.credential: Workday HCM and Advance Compensations Certification (Preferred)
Bachelor’s degree in HR, Business, IT, or related field (Master's preferred)
